Brave
Spyware Level: High

Brave is self updating software, uses Google as the default search engine, has built-in telemetry, and even has an opt-out rss-like news feed similar to Firefox Pocket. These shouldn't be the things that come to mind if someone were to imagine a privacy oriented browser.

(下刪n字)

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brave_(web_browser)#Controversies

Insertion of referral codes

On June 6, 2020, a Twitter user pointed out that Brave inserts affiliate referral codes when users type a URL of Binance into the address bar, which earns Brave money. Further research revealed that Brave redirects the URLs of other cryptocurrency exchange websites, too. In response to the backlash from the users, Brave's CEO apologized and called it a "mistake" and said "we're correcting".[43][44]

Two days later Brave released a new version which they said disabled the auto-completion to partner links,[45] followed by a blog post explaining the issue and apologizing.[46]

有消息指，3月份開始 Brave 公司與一家支那加密貨幣交易平台Binance 合作，於Brave 瀏覽器 監控搜索時某特定字眼而向用戶提供Binance 廣告。事件證明左一個瀏覽器可監控範圍之大及Brave 的不道得行為，手足應馬上抵制使用。即使一套軟件開放源碼，但當到達戶手上時我地無辦法確保程式 (compiled program) 是完全跟足開源程式碼或有否加上其他奇怪後門。

quote.msg: Brave browser 可以Block晒所有網嘅廣告😎

replies.msg:
咪撚再推Brave
個個post都有人推brave

Browsers比較
https://spyware.neocities.org/articles/browsers.html

https://spyware.neocities.org/articles/brave.html
Brave
Spyware Level: High

Brave is self updating software, uses Google as the default search engine, has built-in telemetry, and even has an opt-out rss-like news feed similar to Firefox Pocket. These shouldn't be the things that come to mind if someone were to imagine a privacy oriented browser.

(下刪n字)

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brave_(web_browser)#Controversies

Insertion of referral codes

On June 6, 2020, a Twitter user pointed out that Brave inserts affiliate referral codes when users type a URL of Binance into the address bar, which earns Brave money. Further research revealed that Brave redirects the URLs of other cryptocurrency exchange websites, too. In response to the backlash from the users, Brave's CEO apologized and called it a "mistake" and said "we're correcting".[43][44]

Two days later Brave released a new version which they said disabled the auto-completion to partner links,[45] followed by a blog post explaining the issue and apologizing.[46]

有消息指，3月份開始 Brave 公司與一家支那加密貨幣交易平台Binance 合作，於Brave 瀏覽器 監控搜索時某特定字眼而向用戶提供Binance 廣告。事件證明左一個瀏覽器可監控範圍之大及Brave 的不道得行為，手足應馬上抵制使用。即使一套軟件開放源碼，但當到達戶手上時我地無辦法確保程式 (compiled program) 是完全跟足開源程式碼或有否加上其他奇怪後門。
